channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Day One Ventures’ Masha Bucher on why every founder needs to be an influencer
item.description: Tech is racing ahead while society struggles to keep up. Masha Bucher, founder and GP of Day One Ventures, built her firm around closing that gap by c...

item.title: The Best Golf Rangefinders
item.description: Unlock the course and raise your game with the best golf rangefinders you can buy.

item.title: How to Watch the Leonids Meteor Shower
item.description: This month-long meteor shower peaks just after mid-November and is known for producing bright “fireball” shooting stars. Here’s what to know about Leo...

item.title: Nomad Goods Promo Codes: 25% Off
item.description: Save up to 25% on Nomad Goods accessories such as Nomad phone cases, Nomad wallets, and more this December.

item.title: Gemini was Google’s top trending search term in 2025
item.description: Gemini wasn’t the only AI chatbot to make the list, as DeepSeek ranked seventh among the year’s trending searches.

item.title: Nexus isn’t going all-in on AI, keeping half of its new $700M fund for India startups
item.description: Nexus Venture Partners manages $3.2 billion in capital across its funds and has invested in more than 130 companies over the years.

item.title: The Louisiana Department of Wildlife and Fisheries Is Detaining People for ICE

item.title: New unicorn Brevo raises $583M to challenge CRM giants
item.description: Brevo, a customer relationship management company headquartered in Paris, is now a unicorn.

item.title: Amazon hopes to jump-start its AI coding tool Kiro by giving it away to startups
item.description: Can Kiro win the hearts of startup founders above the many AI coding tools they already have? Amazon hopes a free year will tempt them.

item.title: BMW iX3 2026 Review: Price, Specs, Availability
